title: Modded GTA 4 Xbox 360 NTSC US
description:
This was nuked not to long ago by a Mod thinking it was the same but This torrent is a modded Version other one i have is NOT modded Link to that one is here. http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6744138/GTA_4_NTSC_US_XBOX_360_ISO 

-------------

This is the US version of GTA IV modded ready to be burned.

***Use the .dvd File to burn it has the correct layerbreak***

Credits go to the people who made these mods
